name: Morendo
description:
Morendo

The musical term morendo means that passages in a piece of music should be performed "dying". Morendo is a point & click adventure game about a concert guitarist whose life takes dramatic turns after his performance. Join him and meet peculiar characters that are waiting for you in the Voyeur. Interact with them and step behind the curtain of betrayal, lust and the facade of show business. This game was developed in a game jam, within 48 hours. Enjoy the real sounds of live recorded guitars and immerse yourself in the macabre, hand-drawn world of Morendo.
